dishes.name: Nifty Cake
dishes.label: Hot
dishes.description: A unique combination of Heavenly Designed Cake,you will believe after seeing the manufacturer.The Cake is with Vidalia onion and Buffalo Paneer.

dishes.name: I-rottex Garri
dishes.description: Deep fried Zucchini coated with mildly spiced Chickpea flour batter accompanied with a sweet-tangy tamarind sauce

dishes.name: Vadonut
dishes.label: New
dishes.description: A quintessential ConFusion experience, is it a vada or is it a donut?

dishes.name: ElaiCheese Cake
dishes.description: A delectable, semi-sweet New York Style Cheese Cake, with Graham cracker crust and spiced with Indian cardamoms

promotions.name: Easter Grand Awoof
promotions.label: New
promotions.description: Featuring mouthwatering combinations with a choice of five different flakes, six enticing appetizers, six main entrees and five choicest best diet in just one. Free flowing bubbly and soft drinks. All for just $19.99 per person

leaders.name: Oluwadurotimi Okediji
leaders.description: Our CEO, Oluwadurotimi Okediji,a visionier and ambitious man, he beliefs in impactation He brings his zeal for fusion cuisines in the food legends product, pioneering cross-cultural culinary connections.

leaders.name: Olawale Micheal Juwon
leaders.description: Our TL, Micheal, as he is affectionately referred to by his colleagues -Tech Man, All he loves doing is to play with server, network and physical computing. He belifs that the food legends robot is coming. As he puts it in his own words, Everything that runs, wins, and everything that stays, pays!

leaders.name: Ige Oluwabunmi
leaders.description: Blessed with the most discerning gustatory sense, Bunmi, our CFO, personally ensures that every dish that we serve meets her exacting tastes. Our chefs dread the tongue lashing that ensues if their dish does not meet his exacting standards. She lives by her motto, You click only if you survive my lick.

leaders.name: Oluwafolakemi
leaders.description: Award winning pioneer of the food legends product, a wide International experience having worked closely with whos-who in the culinary world, she specializes in creating mouthwatering diet experiences.she is an endowed entrepreneur

leaders.name: Iyiola Grace
leaders.description: Member of the food legends product, knowledgibile and  experience having worked closely with whos-who in the culinary world, she specializes in creating mouthwatering diet experiences.she is  endowed with writing about foods

leaders.name: Iyeni Mayowa
leaders.description: Member of the food legends product, knowledgibile and  experience having worked with food + money, she specializes in creating savings plan on diet.

leaders.name: Ajao Joshua
leaders.description: Member of the food legends product, knowledgibile and  experienc, a chemical engineer surfing things with the food legends, though a recruit who argues not to be (lol). He is skilfull and passionate.
